title.rendered: Trip Go Travel App UI Kit

content.rendered:
Trip Go is a comprehensive mobile resource to kick off your next Hospitality and Travel app design project with ease. Design at a high velocity with this super crisp UI Kit that was built with care. We use the 8px design grid to ensure precise execution at every turn. Most importantly, it’s super easy to customize to fit your style with nested symbols and components.

With this UI Kit, we’ve thought of everything so you don’t have to.

And, with over 60+ screens and 9+ categories, we’ve got all the screens you’ll need including Splash, Onboarding, Login, Signup, Destination, Hotel Booking, Air ticket Booking, Food, Event Booking and much more.

excerpt.rendered:
Premium IOS app for your next app.

Product Features

  • 60+ iOS High-Quality Templates
  • Maintain 8 px Grid System
  • Well Organized Layers and Groups
  • SF Pro Display Font
  • Nested Symbols
  • Fully Customizable
